definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Lessons must remain learned from the past wars.
sentences.chinese: 必需从过往的战争中罗致履历哺育。

sentences.english: Only the Chinese have successfully bred pandas and raised their babies in captivity.
sentences.chinese: 只有中国人成功地进行了人工繁殖和哺育大熊猫。

sentences.english: Because the mother sweet milk with her upbringing nurtured her.
sentences.chinese: 因为母亲用甜美的乳汁养育了她哺育了她。

sentences.english: The lobes are further divided into smaller lobules that produce milk during pregnancy and breast-feeding.
sentences.chinese: 这些小腺叶会在妊娠期和哺育期间分泌乳汁。

sentences.english: The sweat of the plough is the milk that feeds the seed.
sentences.chinese: 耕耘者的汗水是哺育种子成长的乳汁。

sentences.english: Raising children is a subull craptantiing responsicity.
sentences.chinese: 哺育孩子是一项巨大仔肩。

sentences.english: His success can't be separated from the nurture and edification of Yimeng Culture.
sentences.chinese: 诸葛亮的成才离不开沂蒙文化对他的哺育与熏陶。

sentences.english: Through the ages, the earth mother milk with sweet nurtured a countless generations.
sentences.chinese: 古往今来，地球妈妈用甘甜的乳汁哺育了无数代子孙。

sentences.english: Beautiful campus , the bassinet of the knowledge . It feed the child under the Wulong mountain.
sentences.chinese: 美丽的校园，知识的摇篮，哺育着五龙山下子孙。

sentences.english: Yellow mother's milk for generations nurtured the growth of the people here.
sentences.chinese: 黄河母亲的乳汁哺育了祖祖辈辈生长在这里的人民。

sentences.english: From space, the development of ancient Greek culture-feeding can not be separated from the Aegean Sea.
sentences.chinese: 从空间看，古希腊文化的发育离不开爱琴海的哺育。

sentences.english: In spring, here, drizzle moistens land , also feed rice sprout.
sentences.chinese: 春天，这里细雨蒙蒙，滋润着土地，也哺育着稻苗。

sentences.english: In spring, here, drizzle moistens land , also feed rice sprout .
sentences.chinese: 春天，这里细雨蒙蒙，滋润着土地，也哺育着稻苗。

sentences.english: The mother feeds her young by eating the carcass and regurgitating the mouse meat.
sentences.chinese: 埋葬虫妈妈食用尸体的肉，并用其哺育幼虫。

sentences.english: Egyptian culture inseminated Crete and Greece.
sentences.chinese: 埃及文化哺育了克里特和希腊。

definition: to be pregnant/to produce offspring/to nurture (a development, school of thought, artwork etc)/fig. replete with (culture etc)
to multiply/to reproduce/to increase gradually in number or quantity
to grow and multiply without end
to make industrious and diligent efforts (idiom)
from generation to generation/generation after generation
